# Fastify Authentication Service - AI Coding Agent Instructions

## Project Overview

This is a **production-ready Fastify authentication microservice** using **Prisma ORM** with SQLite, **bcryptjs** password hashing, **JWT cookie-based auth**, and comprehensive **OpenTelemetry observability** (LGTM stack). The project uses **ES modules** throughout and is optimized for **pnpm** package manager.
